title: Generate OpenAPI Specs from a Postman Collection
author: Rishabhjot Sandhu
description:
Generate OpenAPI Specs from a Postman Collection. This can be used for integration with wxO and wxA. 
You will need to create a collection (https://learning.postman.com/docs/getting-started/first-steps/creating-the-first-collection/). 
Your API key (https://learning.postman.com/docs/developer/postman-api/authentication/) and collection ID (https://global.discourse-cdn.com/getpostman/original/2X/9/92ec22ff0b369a63fd76f7efde4735fe5bf8570c.png).
